animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am a very large animal.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐈 I purr when I'm happy.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat breadcrumbs.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
🌧️ I like being in the rain.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: I have brown spots.
🌿 I am a herbivore.
🦒 I am the tallest mammal.

animal.question: I live in the sea and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🧠 I am a very smart invertebrate.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
🌱 I eat plants and grass.
🦘 I can jump very high.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌱 I eat mostly grass.
🦁 Lions often hunt me.

animal.question: I build dams and have large front teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to chew on wood.
🏠 I build my home in water.
🦫 Beaver is my name.

animal.question: I blend in with my surroundings and change color. What am I?

hints.text: 🦎 I am a reptile.
🐛 I eat insects.
🎭 My camouflage helps me hide.

animal.question: I am a nocturnal bird of prey with silent flight. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I hoot at night.
🐭 I eat small rodents.
✨ I have excellent hearing.

plant.question: I have a bright yellow face and follow the sun all day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I love warm weather.
🌻 I grow very tall and have a big head.
🫘 My seeds are yummy to eat!

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a yummy treat for monkeys.
🍌 I am yellow when I'm ready to eat.
🌴 I grow in bunches on a tree.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful petals. I smell very sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a gift.
🌿 My stem has sharp spikes.
🌸 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I am a long, orange root vegetable that rabbits love to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me.
👁️ I am good for your eyes.

plant.question: I am tall and strong and provide shade. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a trunk and branches.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to hide nuts in me.

plant.question: I am a vine with purple, green or red fruit. I'm often used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 I can be made into wine.
🌱 I have seeds inside.

plant.question: I have a tough outer shell and can float on water. You can drink my juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a palm tree.
🥥 My flesh is white and delicious.
🏝️ You often find me on a tropical island.

plant.question: I’m a round vegetable that can be many colours including green, yellow, and orange. I'm often used for carving in October. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 People often carve me for Halloween.
🥧 You can make a pie out of me.
🍁 I grow on a vine and get big in the fall.

plant.question: I'm a plant that can live for hundreds of years and get very, very tall. People write down my age by counting the rings inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 My wood is used to build houses and furniture.
🧮 You can tell my age by counting my rings.
🌱 I start as a tiny seed and grow into something huge.

plant.question: I am a spice that comes from the bark of a tree. My flavor is warm and sweet and often used in desserts. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I come from the inside of tree bark.
🍪 I taste delicious in cookies and cakes.
☕ I smell amazing in hot drinks.
